title: Chao Bian Zhan Tuo
synopsis: Super-changeable Zhanto is a brand new gyro sports that has swept the world! By superimposing the super ring on the main spinning top, the super variable battle spinning can instantly burst out miraculous explosive energy. In order to pursue the title of the strongest "Zhan Tuo King", gyro players from all over the world have gathered in the Zhan Tuo Academy to stage a passionate gyro duel! Turn left and right, start the strongest duel! ! ! Let's fight together! (translated from iqiyi)
